title: Works really well!
comment: With this app you can set times that your sounds turn off and the set times for them to turn back on...and does it well!
Works well but can't find in play anymore

title: One of those "must have" apps
comment: Whenever I have to reset or get a new phone, this is one of the first installed.

title: DEAD PROJECT!
comment: Doesn't work on Kit Kat. I've had this app since Froyo and it worked flawlessly up to Jelly Bean. Now, it doesn't like Kit Kat. Please fix it, there was no match for it.

title: Needs an update
comment: Unfortunately,  no menu button to set up controls for my S5. Worked great on my S3.    Update to review:  Found menu button (only because I searched online for "S5 menu button").  Where menu button was on previous models, you have to hold down for about a second or two instead of just tapping.  Was able to set up my volume controls after that.  Changing from 1-star to 4-stars.  Still would like a separate menu button within the app instead of relying solely on phone's features.

title: Just the best
comment: A little bit old fashioned but does the job, never fails. I recommend.

title: Not working right
comment: Since dst is over, it's acting like the time didn't change at all. Running all tasks an hour early.
The best

title: Missing menu button
comment: There is no menu button available on my LG G3, so I can't use the most helpful feature of this app! So disappointed...

title: GS3 works, GS5 doesn't
comment: Loved the app on my Galaxy S3 but needs some updates to run on the GS5

title: Solved my midnight email notification problem
comment: Only app I could find that would allow me to schedule the volume of notifications & the ringer separately. Now I can schedule email alerts to silent between 11pm-7am but keep the ringer on for on call emergencies!

title: Best !!!
comment: I've had this app forever. It's great. Turn down at night and up in the morning.  Love it!

title: Samsung S5
comment: I loved this app but now that I got my Samsung S5 I can't find the menu button. Frustrating.

title: A true Noah's Ark!
comment: God sent App to cleanse the android world of sinful notification sounds at inappropriate times. Allows schedules to control volumes mainly if you forget to put off sound before going to asleep. Thanks a mill!

title: Awesome
comment: I've been using this app for years. still works great.

title: Not working on droid mini.
comment: Worked great on my droid incredible 2 but it does not set the volumes correctly on my droid mini.

title: Great app!!
comment: Use it for work so my phone volumes goes down during work and back up when I leave so I don't miss calls.

title: Excellent!
comment: Great app.

title: The most valuable app on play
comment: I've used this app for years. It provides invaluable functionality. I lost it once and spent forever looking for it again. I can't think what would make this app better 5*

title: EXCELLENT
comment: THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED TO KEEP MY GOOFY PHONE FROM TURNING MY NOTIFICATION RINGER OFF & ON WILLY NILLY ON IT OWN. NOW WHEN I WANT TO SLEEP I DON'T GET WOKE UP ANYMORE. THANK YOU DEVELOPER. THIS IS AWESOME!!!

title: Great App
comment: I have been using it for over a year and works great on my Samsung Note II.

title: Vibration Error
comment: Multiple vibation settings in settings vs schedules cancel out. So my phone vibrates all the time. Ruins an otherwise 5 star app! Please FIX!

title: Better Interface Than Most
comment: So simple, it just works. I use this to turn volumes low at night and back on in the AM. Perfect.

title: Funky design, but excellent product!
comment: Ever have that problem where you're a sound sleeper with your ring tone set to high, but  mornings need to turn it lower? Maybe you have scheduled meetings, church, etc., where you need to turn off all notifications or poor it on vibrate? This is the app for that.  The app does take a little time to get used to it, but after you understand how to set up a schedule for each product, it's exciting what this can do. If you think there's a better tool that can do this for better, I doubt it. But let me know!
Great stuff

title: Useful
comment: The application now works on my S3 with Android 4.1+.  I've found it very useful to avoid accidentally having a ring tone going off at maximum volume while at work.  I did reduce my rating by one star since it only adjusts the sound when I’m logged into the phone.  This is not a problem since I leave my phone logged in while at work, since I’m listening to music, but it is less than ideal.

title: Great program
comment: Outstanding program. No battery performance hit. Easy to use. Highly recommended. Don't hesitate to download.
Brilliant!

title: Fixes sound & vibration settings when they break!
comment: I spent hours on calls with Verizon and Motorola techs trying to make my Droid Razr Maxx vibrate when I got text and email messages, all with no success. The settings just didn't work right. Sound Manager let me access the settings that fixed my phone so it vibrated when I got new text and email notifications. I emailed the Motorola tech to tell him about this solution since he and his colleagues could not find one. Droid Gingerbread notification vibration issues were not very common, but new issues are now coming up with Jellybean sound and vibration settings. This app still lets me access the sound settings to reset them when they break. Nothing else works! Sound Manager does other good things too, but this is why I need it.
Works great

title: Blocks SMS sounds on Galaxy S4
comment: Was my favorite app on my DROID X2 (Gingerbread). Just got my Galaxy S4 (ICS) and this was the first app I installed. Unfortunately, it is blocking all SMS sound notifications. Can't live with that and have to uninstall. Fix this one bug and I'm back on board.

title: sounds like a good app, if it would only work
comment: the app stalls on the introduction screen so I can't get passed it to actual use it.   oh well. i'll download a similar app.

title: Ringer doesn't ever stop going off when a profile is selected
comment: Whenever I select a profile,  the ringer just keeps looping/playing forever.  None of the phones controls stop it. I have to go back into to your app and force the ringer volume down. It defeats the purpose of having a profile.  Samsung Galaxy S4.

title: So so handy!
comment: No more sleep interruptions!

title: Awesome APP!!!
comment: I have needed an app like this for a LONG time!!  I really hate to have to MANUALLY set my volume for meetings and such . . . and this app removes the need to "remember" and not have my phone ringing in the middle of an important meeting or class!    VERY Highly RECOMMENDED!!!!!

title: Quick, easy, free, no special permissions. Perfect
comment: The title pretty much says it all. It lets you change the "secret" volume controls. I needed it to change the "In-Call" volume so I could hear people during my Skpe calls. Thanks!

title: Was good
comment: I depended on this app several times a day and then all of a sudden the sound volume and the ringer volume connected,  turning up or down, together. Uninstalled.

title: Disabled low battery alert
comment: You heard correct! With this app, you can get rid of that annoying low battery alert. Just put system volume to zero- BINGO! NO MORE FU**EN LOW BATTERY ALERTS ON YOUR PHONE ^_^

title: Awesome
comment: Thank you. It's great app. Useful to enable every volume my phone got. Also no ads in this version.

title: Samsung Note II
comment: Great app. Must have for those that want to fully customise their phone.

title: Used on all my devices

title: A mostly good app
comment: This app does a good job overall. Frankly I think setting up schedules could be a bit easier by connecting the on and off parts into one schedule but that's just my opinion. Beyond that I noticed this app struggled with daylight savings time. I had to actually uninstall and re-install to get it straightened out.

title: Very nice
comment: Finally I can quickly access all the volumes I need. The only downside is the lack of landscape mode. It supports only portrait mode, but that's not a major concern for most people. However, I'm using this on my PadFone+keyboard=netook, so I'm very often in landscape.   It's a five star program even though it still needs the landscape mode.

title: Beware 4.0 and higher android users!
comment: This app works great on my older phone running gingerbread but my new nexus 4 has everything locked down with no option in the sound menu to unlock the notification/ringer volume levels so that they operate independently :(  I'm not sure if this is a matter of the app needing to have something updated to unlock this or if it's simply hard coded into android but either way, it sucks and it renders this app useless unfortunately for anyone with 4.0 or higher.  To the developer, if root access is required to unlock this function, please please release a root version for those of us who wish to have these sliders all moving freely of one another!

Before, you could lower the volume all the way and keep vibrate on. Now there is no way to have the phone silenced and with vibrate on with this app.

title: Good
comment: Ironically it fixed my no vibration issue for my notifications so that was a big plus for me

title: not right since ICS update
comment: app now mutes media based on ringer level, even though showing full volume. and as others reported, silencing ring mutes and vibrates all. now I have to keep fiddling with it, invalidating the reason for a manager! needs some work to get back to 4 stars.

title: Needs a way to back up settings
comment: I've tried a few others. This one is the best one I've found. Only thing thing missing is a way to back up the settings. I've had to reformat my phone for other reasons and it would be great if I could have saved the setting to the SD card first. Give me that, and I'll give you 5 stars.

title: One of my favorite apps for the SGS Fascinate
comment: Works perfect for my SGS Fascinate, having slight troubles with it running on the Galaxy Nexus.

title: WAS Awesome...
comment: ...until I switched to USCC Galaxy S3. Now the schedules don't apply correctly. Please update and I'll be happy to change my rating back to 5 stars. Is currently useless on my phone.

title: Awesome
comment: This app is ingenious. I am a teacher and will tell all of my students to get it. No more being woken up in the middle of the night by spam email either. Thanks!

title: Schedule & control volume
comment: I install this on every phone I get. Now phone calls can wake me up in the middle of the night as it is probably an emergency, but email, sms,  social media apps etc are silent....  WooHoo!

title: Disables multiple functions - including phone
comment: Since installing, I've had system wide failures. I even had problems getting my device to make calls. It disabled Zedge ringtones, I get no sound on alerts... I left it running overnight and luckily, my alarm went off -- it was a simple beep, since the tone that normally goes off is now disabled (it's a Zedge tone). Axked wife to text me and I received no alert at all -- Sound Manager went into non-vibrate mode on its own. Too bad, I really needed this. Going into the trash.

title: Can't decouple ringtone
comment: I want to love this app, but for me scheduling my notification sounds to turn off also turns off the ringtone. There isn't an option in my phone settings to decouple the two as stated in the app FAQ. Galaxy Nexus on stock Jellybean.

title: Ok but
comment: Good but... We should be able to choose 1) to scroll through volumes instead of having 2 pages or 2) choosr which volumes we want on the first page.

Why can't I email you though another email other than outlook? Can you please get  back to me? This worked great on my evo and in the beginning with my s3 but it seems after icecream it changed. Maybe it is not compatible with that?

title: Great!
comment: This app works great!

title: Exactly what I need!!!

When you have a schedule to set the ringtone/alerts to silent + vibrate, it instead sets the phone to silent + no vibrate. This never happened when I had the same schedules on the SGS so I suspect it's an HTC (one?) specific bug. I'm happy to be proved incorrect if we're doing something wrong, though...

title: Great
comment: Fixes problems with notifications not vibrating. Useful tool.

title: Works Great
comment: Not sure why one would have to download an app to get the vibrate function to work correctly on a brand new phone. But, that's what It took. I tried re-boots, re-sets, battery pulls, service calls, different apps and even pulled out a few hairs! I could not get my phone to vibrate on any notifications, only ring and misc functions. I installed this Sound Manager app and taa daa! everything works great....who knew..... Thank you, CellCom, Motorola Milestone X2.

title: Finally!
comment: Been searching for hours for a decent scheduling app for my notifications and ringer.  Finally found one that allows me to set not only when I need it silent, but how much to adjust the volumes!  Now I can go to work and know that everything is set to an appropriate level.  I also can sleep better without all the little blips and bleeps that the phone makes at night.  Only thing I would like to see is a start and end time for the profiles, other than that it's perfect!
Not what i wanted, it is still difficult & takes effort to make your phone silent when ringing

title: Please update for Ice Cream Sandwich
comment: I have been using this app for 7 months and really liked it until my phone was upgraded to Android 4.0.4, and now I hear the notifications when they should be silent, or else my entire phone is silenced. Please update this app so that it works just as well with Ice Cream Sandwich as it did with Gingerbread. Thanks!

title: Keep it up!
comment: I nonchalantly downloaded this app quite some time ago and have been satisfied. Now, I've recently noticed that a schedule sometimes won't apply. So, naturally, like a fickle free app user, I started searching around again to see what's popped up in the market. Oh my gosh, such limitations in the other apps. So, to the dev, good work and keep it up.

title: What happened?
comment: This was WAY better when all volume sliders were on one screen. It's made it less convenient now... :(  Loved it before.

title: Awesome
comment: Justlove this app

title: Awesome
comment: I have the Motorola ATRIX 2 and it would always vibrate when I receive a text. Apparently Motorola makes it so that you can't disable it. Well this app solved the problem. THANK YOU!

title: Best app ever!
comment: My phone never wakes me up at night now. Thank you!

title: Great app
comment: After more than week trying my vibration to work on my almost new Samsung galaxy s2 this app solved the problem immediately.great work guys.

title: Does not work will not silence phone

title: Saved My Relationship!
comment: If you're looking for an app that will prevent those irritating midnight notifications, this is it. Because droid won't allow you to define your day, all day reminders start going off at midnight.  Everyone needs this app.  Thank you developer!

title: Great
comment: Exactly what I was looking for. Tired of random Facebook and Email notifications while sleeping! Perfect app.

title: Good utility app
comment: Good utility app, schedule feature is very handy. Would like to see auto-rotate option and a widget to quickly adjust volume levels. Using on Sony Tablet S.

title: Good
comment: I love it when it works but... It doesnt always adjust the volume. I think it has to do with me powering down the phone or setting it to silent mode through the phones quick settings and not the app.

title: Essential!
comment: Just wish there was a landscape mode. It does need the ability to save to SD to be a 5 star app.

title: Love it
comment: Takes up little space... Love the scheduling! Wish there was a start/end time with scheduling tho. Easy to use. HTC EVO 4g
Just the app I was looking for! The HTC Inspire has a limited ability to control sounds at night. Every Inspire user needs this app.

title: Fixed an issue
comment: I had an issue with a separate app tied to notifications and installing this allowed me to reset the system settings easily. Thank you!

comment: Worked for a week. Now my phone rings loudly at work. Schedules on this are useless and keeps reverting to loud ringer volume about an hour after the schedule is reapplied. Waste of time...

title: Useful and lightweight
comment: Does what it's meant to do.

title: Awesome
comment: Great app. makes controlling the sounds on my skyrocket much easier. Also fixed my SMS notification, phone won't vibrate before.

title: Brilliant app
comment: Really easy to set up and use. I have silenced everything at night so I don't get woken up.  Would recommend!

title: Very Functional
comment: Does what it says it does, quite well in fact.  User interface is very functional, but ugly.  Take the functionality, bolt on a pretty user interface, and this would be a 5 star app.

title: Controls vibration
comment: Use menu / vibration... this app is amazing!!!
Nice and clean app

title: Great for school!
comment: My phone is automatically silent at school, and turns back up at the end of the day! Simple UI, easy to understand, great app, and FREE! Tell your friends, I've told mine :)

title: Not wotking as desired
comment: The schedule functionality for volumes doesn't set the volume correctly. Sometimes scheduled value is not set at all. Was installed on Android 2.2 and removing it now.
Is there a  paid version?
Love the fact you can turn off vibrate!
My phone stopped vibrating on incoming texts & this app fixed the problem! It's finally working normally again :)

title: Very Happy
comment: Does what it says on the box. Thank you very much to the developer for releasing a well made, well designed app with no ads.  Unsure why there are separate Sound Manager and Sound Manager v2 applications on the marketplace as opposed to simply having an update of the initial app.

title: Great App
comment: Use this on my Atrix. Works flawlessly. I use it to automatically silence notifications at night.

title: Perfect
comment: this app is does exactly what I want and wanted for along time back when I used ios.   thank you

title: Fixed vibrate issue with Samsung Galaxy Nexus
comment: I'm running a Samsung Galaxy Nexus and I could not get vibration notifications to work for SMS, Email or any messaging application even when vibrate was set to always under each app and sound settings.  Many different websites suggested installing Sound Manager V2 to resolve the issues, and it has.  I'm super pleased, thank you.

title: Outstanding!
comment: Just the right thing. Tested many apps and this one is absolutely amazing! No problems to add new schedules after reading tutorials. Stylish interface. Much better than paid for apps and no adds. Thanks!

title: No "add" button
comment: There's no way to add a schedule soon this thing is really hard to work with. Please fix. Using htc incredible.

title: It would be great if any holiday setting
comment: Sound manager is very cool application in the android market. It would be great if any holiday setting also available in it.
Thanks for the great app

title: It's Good. 2 issues.
comment: Tutorial does not work, says I must press the next button, but there is no next button to press. Is it possable to split the Notification sound schedule. I would like to receive text/SMS from my kids late at night, but don't want to be woken up by emails comming in.

title: Love it
comment: Works great!

title: A Must have
comment: First realy free and useful app.

title: CRAP!

comment: But it would be sweet if I could just turn vibrate on and off easily instead of having to go through all the phones settings. -Droid x

title: Relationship saver.
comment: My phone has multiple accounts with multiple apps with differentiated notifications. This app reliably keeps the interruption level low at night.

title: Great App
comment: Very useful. I don't have to manually turn different volume levels down before going to bed and then again turning them back up after I wake up.

title: Fixed my vibrate
comment: My vibrate was not working, even with all settings on. This fixed it!

Simply sets volumes, no sound profile wich i expected to have

title: Great
comment: It's exactly what I'm looking for. So much more precise than many other apps on the market too.

title: Awesome!

title: PERFECT!
comment: Great app that works perfectly on my HTC ThunderBolt. I use it all the time to change my ringtone and notification loudness. I turn them up when my phone is in my purse, down when it's sitting right next to me on a table. Thank you.

title: Bob
comment: Great app for controlling all volume levels at various times during the day. Simple and easy to use interface.

title: Great for Root CM 7 Evo Users!
comment: My phone didn't vibrate on notifications until I got this app. I love it! Works great with Evo 4G.
Doesn't do the correct volumes for the correct times.
Love this app. Would like a backup to sd for the schedule so when I change phones I don't have to do it manually

title: Best App for Volume/Sound
comment: I absolutely love this app! I haven't had the need to change the volume on my DX since I installed it, love the fact that I can set the schedule the volume to act as my bedside function in my Blackberry, now I have no reason to miss my old Berry at all :)
Can't live without it.

A must have for anyone who tinkers with sound all the time! easy to use and manage.
I've noticed if on call while the schedules are due to change.....they never do. Tbolt. Having alarm on separate screen is added safety for me.
Would be completely perfect if it rotated. And per-contact settings would be awesome.
Outstanding app! W/ my busy schedule, I no longer have to worry about setting my volume low when I crash. I just schedule my down time in the manager!
Works perfectly on Samsung Galaxy S. Changes sound levels automatically, according to time - set and forget.

title: Perfect

I had v1, Congrats to this developer, V2 is the S**T. Much more simple and smooth. Great Job

comment: The scheduler gets confused on my phone and works half of the time. I have the notification and ringer volume go down at night and come back up in the morning on my Epic 4g and it works half the time, also does the same thing on my roommates Transform.
Works great.
